    Author:
    azilet

    • Method Detail

      • isIpAddress

        public boolean isIpAddress(String ip)
        Checks if supplied string is in a valid IP address format encoded in either decimal, binary, octal, or hexadecimal. Strings for which this method returns true are not guaranteed to represent valid IP addresses.
        Parameters:
        ip - IP address string to check
        Returns:
        true if supplied string can be parsed as IP address; false otherwise

      • isDecimalIpAddress

        public boolean isDecimalIpAddress(String ip)
        Checks if supplied string is in a valid IP address format encoded in decimal. Strings for which this method returns true are not guaranteed to represent valid IP addresses.
        Parameters:
        ip - IP address string to check
        Returns:
        true if supplied string can be parsed as IP address; false otherwise

      • isBinaryIpAddress

        public boolean isBinaryIpAddress(String ip)
        Checks if supplied string is in a valid IP address format encoded in binary. Strings for which this method returns true are not guaranteed to represent valid IP addresses.
        Parameters:
        ip - IP address string to check
        Returns:
        true if supplied string can be parsed as IP address; false otherwise

      • isOctalEncodedIpAddress

        public boolean isOctalEncodedIpAddress(String ip)
        Checks if supplied string is in a valid IP address format encoded in octal. Strings for which this method returns true are not guaranteed to represent valid IP addresses.
        Parameters:
        ip - IP address string to check
        Returns:
        true if supplied string can be parsed as IP address; false otherwise

      • isHexEncodedIpAddress

        public boolean isHexEncodedIpAddress(String ip)
        Checks if supplied string is in a valid IP address format encoded in hex. Strings for which this method returns true are not guaranteed to represent valid IP addresses.
        Parameters:
        ip - IP address string to check
        Returns:
        true if supplied string can be parsed as IP address; false otherwise

      • isNumericIpAddress

        public boolean isNumericIpAddress(String ip)
        Checks if supplied string is a numeric representation of an IP address.
        Parameters:
        ip - IP address to check
        Returns:
        true if supplied string can be parsed as IP address; false otherwise

      • toInetAddress

        public InetAddress toInetAddress(String ip)
        Parses and converts supplied string to IP address instance. This method returns an IP address instance only if isIpAddress(java.lang.String) returns true.
        Parameters:
        ip - IP address string to convert
        Returns:
        IP address instance if successfully parsed; null otherwise
